**Accessibility Conformance Testing Tender Announcement**
=================================================================
### Solicitation Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada invites bids for the provision of Accessibility Conformance Testing services to meet the ongoing needs of Government of Canada organizations.

**Trade Agreement:** This procurement is subject to the following international trade agreements: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Free Trade Agreements with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, and the United Kingdom.

**Tender Description:**

The successful bidder will provide conformance testing services for Information Communication Technology (ICT) systems against ICT accessibility requirements. This includes:

* Web accessibility conformance testing
* Document accessibility testing
* Software accessibility conformance testing
* Native Mobile Applications accessibility conformance testing
* Hardware ICT accessibility conformance testing
* Accessibility test coordination

**Bidder Eligibility and Requirements:**

Registered suppliers with Informatics Professional Services expertise are eligible to bid. Suppliers must demonstrate the ability to meet the required testing standards and provide services in both official languages of Canada.

**Contract Awards:**

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. A Standing Offer will be awarded for an initial one-year period with four (4) option periods to be exercised annually. The SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT (subject to approval by the contracted entity) will provide a consistent and standardized process for delivering Accessibility Conformance Testing services to all Government of Canada organizations.

**Tender Information:**

* **Solicitation Number:** 2B0KB-219754/A
* **Publication Date:** 2023-02-20
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-01T14:00:00
